title: Demon's Rising
description: Traitor to the crown, Kaleah is forced on the run. Threatened by war, the Flaming Sword is her only hope to overthrow the Demon Empress, but it's been lost to the ages of time. As she seeks to recover the sword, she struggles with her growing attraction toward Ryker. But the desires of her heart mean nothing if she can't master the demon awakening within her; a battle she can't afford to lose. Not when failure means certain death, and will secure Lilitha's reign of eternal darkness.
author: J.R.    White
